spatial_accuracy.notes: Generally accurate layout following the blueprint. Discrepancies noted in the living room window width and the balcony/closet door orientation which appears simplified compared to the source.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Wall thickness is consistent. The main entryway door (bottom center) is missing a clear door leaf, appearing more like an open threshold.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly faithful to the blueprint including the kitchen island, L-shaped sofa arrangement, and bedroom layouts. Scale is appropriate.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with soft, clean lighting. Geometry is sharp with minimal artifacts. Orthographic projection is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Swing direction for the balcony closet door is reversed compared to the floor plan.
The large bay window in the living room is rendered as a flat window unit, losing the angular depth shown in the 2D plan.
Missing the specific door swing geometry for the main apartment entrance at the bottom of the plan.
The 'Hallucinated' door leaf on the right-side exit to 'Chandler & Joey's' is positioned slightly higher on the wall than the blueprint indicates.
